name: Fantasy Friend Finder
description:
I made a game with my 6 year old!

I designed this game my 6 tear old daughter when she got interested in Dungeons and Dragons. We soon realized that combat and rules were not our specialty. We wanted to play a game that focused on something else.

Making friends! 

Fantasy Friend Finders is about learning collaborative storytelling, about solving problems with your imagination and helping out others!

A very simple to use coin flip allows you to craft your stories together, creating a world of mystery and wonder together!
